space_pew.name: Space Pew
space_pew.description_1: A space shooter game like the days of old. Has levels, score system, and bullet upgrades.
space_pew.description_2: Control your ship with WASD and K to shoot!
space_pew.description_3: Choose your difficulty! Made with Pygame.

stat_tracker.name: Stat Tracker
stat_tracker.description_1: A stat tracker made to record my scores on aim trainers.
stat_tracker.description_2: Creates files and displays a graph after use.

pete-bot.name: Pete-bot[WIP]
pete-bot.description: A work in progress discord bot
pete-bot.description_2: I have a tuna salad sandwich ready
